html:
1.22.24  9:08 pm   Have you ever written a song directed at a specific person (aside from yourself or "whoever's listening")?

      not that i recall

1.22.24  8:37 pm   should i write a song about a pansexual dog?

      you can, but you needn't feel like it's an obligation per se

1.22.24  8:25 pm   Have you always not been persuaded in the songwriting process about what someone other than you might think about the song?

     persuaded to what

     If you cared in the past, did you suddenly stop caring or was it a process?

     i want people to like and love the songs very much. but the best and only true remedy for that is to write them in a way that i like and love. that's the first rule of songwriting. like taking an exam, you must hold your own pencil, not grab your neighbor's hand and write with their pencil in their hand on your paper

     I would say from my perspective, one characteristic of the bill wurtz genre is unconcerned in that sense

     i'm just doing it in what i consider to be the normal way

1.22.24  7:56 pm   i lost my carrot in the oven tomorrow, can you give any advice thahnk uoy

      didn't happen

1.22.24  7:36 pm   i asked a question but forgot what it was. this led me down a spiral which made me have an existential crisis, which made me want to have a pastrami sandwich and cry, which made me want to consume the entire country of serbia. how do i fix this? also, thoughts on shrubs?

      you are doing fine

1.22.24  7:30 pm   How do you make the texts in your videos feel 3d when they are 2d

      spin them around

1.22.24  7:20 pm   Should I focus on bass or japanese?

      maybe you could alternate

1.22.24  7:18 pm   why do we have only watermelons and not firemelons?

      i believe there are firemelons. they are not sold in stores because they are a firehazard. they are probably better used in war, where being a firehazard is considered a desirable quality

1.22.24  7:05 pm   what is your favorite letter

      using all different letters in combination. that's the only thing that does it for me anymore

1.22.24  6:48 pm   how do you stop thinking about the future?

      you won't be able to stop thinking about it, but you can go there and experience it first hand in addition to thinking about it

1.22.24  6:46 pm   If you're mad at yourself, for whatever reason, is there some useful strategy for making peace with yourself again? 

      sure. if you hear about how other people can be mad at themselves also, this will help you calm down i think

1.22.24  6:13 pm   what do you do when you just can't make anything you're happy with/can't stick to one consistent style? i feel like i've become so influenced by other music that i can't figure out what i actually sound like as myself and that just makes me feel like everything i make sounds boring and empty

      just think, 'what would you do if you were allowed to have fun'

1.22.24  5:28 pm   whats the best button on a keyboard?

     space

     why?

     it's huge

1.22.24  5:15 pm   Would you ever write a musical 

      yes

1.22.24  5:10 pm   I really want to be creative and make things but I don't know how?

      no one who makes creative things knows how either. it's not knowable. that's what makes it so ridiculous of course

1.22.24  4:20 pm   do you pronounce gif like gif or jif

      i've never pronounced gif

1.22.24  4:12 pm   have you been to amsterdam

      yes i have

1.22.24  4:09 pm   Why do I eat grass?

      it's there

1.22.24  3:01 pm   what's your favorite time of the day?

      0:00

1.22.24  12:59 pm   Tips for overcoming a superiority complex? 

      how about total failure

1.22.24  12:54 pm   Would you like to overthrow the government?

      no

1.22.24  12:30 pm   Did you know that purple is one of the most hated colors by men?

      i don't believe that

1.22.24  10:46 am   How to stop making the same mistake over and over again

      write up an official instructions sheet for how to make that mistake

1.22.24  10:36 am   are you fond of the australian accent

      at this point i've found myself liking and disliking every dialect i've ever heard, depending on who's speaking it

1.22.24  10:36 am   if you had to choose, do you think lofi recording (white noise, noise pollution, amp hissing) sounds best or does crystal clear hifi sound best?

      it might sound great to switch from one to the other, from time to time

1.22.24  9:36 am   Help me I'm stupid?

      prove it

1.22.24  8:22 am   Why do you sometimes answer a question with your answer to the previous question?

      most of the time, this won't work. therefore, when the chance comes, when 2 questions come along that could work well with the same answer, i may jump at the opportunity. especially if the questions are quite different

1.22.24  2:59 am   Would you ever answer these questions with your voice to practice interviewing? 

      i wouldn't do anything like that on this page

1.22.24  1:20 am   are you the most productive in sommer or in winter?  

      equally

1.22.24  12:36 am   I have lots of ideas at night while lying in bed, and some of them are good but all the mind-flowing makes it difficult for me to close my eyes and sleep. Are there any ways to sleep and have good ideas at the same time?

     yes, but then it's almost impossible to remember the ideas

     Also why is it easier for me to sleep during the day even if I slept fine the night before?

     i have no idea

1.21.24  11:04 pm   why earth so dumb what do you think?

      have you tried backgammon

1.21.24  9:04 pm   what are your thoughts on albums given that you only release your songs as singles?

      i always imagine them as being way better than a song. but when i hear a real one it seems way way way way worse than a song. just a list of songs, which is in fact worse than a song, for me. However, to be fair, i suspect the album experience might be better if i were holding it physically and sniffing the cover while listening to it. which i actually haven't tried yet

1.21.24  8:16 pm   how long does it take for you to think of a response?

      anywhere between 1 second and 100 million years

1.21.24  8:11 pm   how do i remember to drink enough water 

      that's impossible. if you actually drink enough, you will be drinking it so often you won't notice and it won't be memorable

1.21.24  8:02 pm   have you ever been through an existential crisis?

      sure, that's part of my daily routine

1.21.24  7:55 pm   Were you the hearthrob back in the highschool 

      i don't recall

1.21.24  6:40 pm   can i talk to you for 4000 hours

      that sounds lovely

1.21.24  3:24 pm   Why does this question page sometimes make me feel like I have transcended the spacetime continuum and overcome meaningless but unavoidable perceived boundaries of identity?

      must be the purple font

1.21.24  2:41 pm   The guy looking for proof of self in i'm a huge gamer most of the time, is he going through an ego rebirth?

     not that i know of

     And did he find what he was looking for?

      yes

1.21.24  2:09 pm   do you recommend veggies?

      they are self-recommending

1.21.24  1:45 pm   Is it a viable way to learn drums if you just treat it as a cool object thats really good at imitating the sounds of a drum

      i'm not sure

1.21.24  11:46 am   why did the chicken cross the road?

      keep appearances up

1.21.24  11:33 am   do you ever see yourself making another video similar to the "wild frolicking adventures" one?

      yes

1.21.24  11:28 am   what do you think? 

      i'll see if i can describe it for you

1.21.24  11:01 am   what's your favorite major city in the us?

      am i allowed to change my mind and then change it back

1.21.24  10:23 am   i have so much trouble starting on things that i should be doing, even playing games, have you ever felt the same?

     sometimes

     how do i get over it?

     you may have to get your ducks in a row. or, in case you think you don't have any ducks, you need to go ahead and find those ducks first

1.21.24  9:37 am   Do chairs exist?

      i believe so

1.21.24  9:17 am   sometimes I give answers to questions that don't make immediate sense to me, only to realize why I gave that answer later. does this happen to you?

      i believe so

1.21.24  7:18 am   Bill will you ever perform on SNL

      i'll see what i can do

1.21.24  4:44 am   if someone sent you a message on paper in a bottle through pigeons would you accept it

      no, even worse i probably would not receive it. i have opted out of the pigeon mail system
